prototypes.prototype: Operation_List as C = :A5.IMPORT_ENUM( [ object_enum_flags as N ] )
Next_Operation as C = :A5.IMPORT_ENUM( lastname as C )

argument.name: Operation_List
argument.description: Full filenames for the import operations stored in the currently open table.

argument.name: Next_Operation
argument.description: The next operation of the type.

item.name: Null = Operation name, full path, and filename.
4 = Operation type, layout name, full path, and filename
8 = Quoted operation name, full path, and filename.
12 = Operation type, quoted operation name, full path, and filename formatted for tree control.

argument.name: lastname
argument.description: The quoted name of an operation.

page.description: Returns the name of the next saved Import operation.
page.discussion: The A5.IMPORT_ENUM() method returns a carriage return-line feed separated list of all of the import operations in the database. Limitations: Desktop applications only.
